official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to designate Hopkinsville as a place of holding court for the Western District of Kentucky.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Kentucky shall be held in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to designate Hopkinsville as a place of holding court for the Western District of Kentucky.
